summary: "Final Destination 3" is a 2006 horror movie, the third in the series. High school graduate Wendy has a vision that a roller coaster will crash, and she saves some friends. But Death starts picking off the survivors, and Wendy finds clues in photos she took. With her friend Kevin, she tries to cheat Death by using these clues. The film stars Mary Elizabeth Winstead and Ryan Merriman. It was well-received at the box office, making it the franchise's highest-grossing film at the time.
title: Final Destination 3
